original_title: Shaye Saint John: The Triggers Compilation
overview: Hello again... this series definitely walks the fine line between madness and genius. Dizzying in its detachment to reality and flashing with the bright colors of childhood, Shaye & Kiki is impossible to describe. A cross-dressing contortionist?
tagline: Just keep in mind, you'll be trying to shake it off for hours afterwards.
title: Shaye Saint John: The Triggers Compilation
